title: My Daily Life as a Farmer A Hardworking Day

subtasks: Stepping onto the riding mower
Sitting on the seat to start the engine
Adjusting the seat for comfort
Turning the key to start the mower engine
Checking the fuel level before starting
Using foot pedals to steer the mower
Cleaning the ride-ons after use
Checking for engine oil and topping up if necessary
Checking the air filter and cleaning it if dirty
Examining tires for proper inflation and wear
Operating the combine's steering
Adjusting the combine's settings for optimal harvest
Loading the grain tank periodically during harvesting
Ensuring the combine's binding height is correct
Feeding the bull with hay
Checking the bull's behavior for aggression
Ensuring the bull has clean water access
Preparing the corn planter for operation
Adjusting seed depth and row spacing
Operating the planter to seed the corn
Ensuring proper soil covering after seeding
Measuring the height of wheat stalks
Evaluating the color and condition of wheat leaves
Checking for weed growth between wheat plants
Observing for signs of disease or pests

tasks.task: Inserting boards into soil for seedling protection
subtasks: Marking the area where boards need to be inserted
Bending down to insert boards into the soil
Tamping the soil around the inserted boards

tasks.task: Checking a fence line for integrity
subtasks: Walking along the fence line to inspect posts and wires
Tightening any loose fence wires
Replacing broken posts or wire as needed

tasks.task: Ensuring proper drainage for a field
subtasks: Checking for standing water in low-lying areas
Grading the field surface to improve drainage
Installing or checking drainage tiles
Changing the combine's grain speed
Adjusting auger speeds
Setting the row spacing on the planter
Loading the seed into the planter
Driving the planter across the field at the correct speed

tasks.task: Attaching a cultivator to a tractor
subtasks: Hitching the cultivator to the tractor
Adjusting the depth of the cultivator's tines
Starting the pickup truck's engine
Navigating the truck through fields
Stopping the truck at specific locations
Preparing the potato planter for operation
Spacing the seeds properly in the planter
Ensuring proper seed depth and cover after planting

tasks.task: Watering wheat using a center pivot irrigation system
subtasks: Checking the center pivot's alignment
Operating the pivot to move between crops
Ensuring even water distribution
Setting the disc blade's depth
Driving the disc blade through soil to prepare planting rows

tasks.task: Checking a soil sample for pH
subtasks: Taking a soil sample from the field
Testing the sample in a lab for pH level

tasks.task: Operating a pickup truck to transport soil samples
subtasks: Loading soil samples into the pickup
Driving the truck to the testing facility
Walking through corn rows to inspect plants
Checking plant height and standing
Looking for signs of disease or pests

tasks.task: Running machinery over the farm paddocks
subtasks: Guiding a piece of machinery across the paddocks
Ensuring even coverage of fertilizer or lime

tasks.task: Checking a bail of hay for damage
subtasks: Inspecting the hay fold for molds or breaks
Ensuring the hay quality before feeding
Positioning the fence post in the ground
Using the post pounder to drive in the post
Checking that the post is secure and straight

tasks.task: Collecting or donating produce for a food bank
subtasks: Harvesting excess produce from the farm
Washing and sorting the produce
Packing the produce into boxes or bags
Transporting the produce to the food bank
Calculating the amount of fertilizer needed based on soil test results
Loading the fertilizer spreader onto the tractor
Adjusting the spreader's settings for optimal application
Driving the tractor across the field while operating the spreader
Tilling the soil to a suitable depth
Raking the field to remove rocks and debris
Leveling the field with a moldboard plow
